posts.post_title: FS- T206 SC Joss Port P-F
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

Just have a T206 Joss Portrait SC 350 30 for sale- $40 total including dc and shipping.  Large scans make card looks better in person.  Card has heavy wear, paper loss and some ink marks on front, scans are enlarged card looks better in person.
